Uses of Interface
jgame.controller.Controller

  • Packages that use Controller 
    Package Description
    jgame
    The JGame package contains everything related to the JGame game library.
    jgame.controller
    The jgame.controller package contains the JGame controller framework.

    • Uses of Controller in jgame

      Classes in jgame that implement Controller 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  GParallax.GTiledSprite.ScrollController
      A controller that allows scrolling of a tiled instance, with automatic resets when the object's position leaves its origin bounding box.
      Fields in jgame with type parameters of type Controller 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Controller> GObject.controllers
      The list of controllers on this object.
      private java.util.List<Controller> GObject.controllersToBeAdded
      The list of controllers to be added.
      private java.util.List<Controller> GObject.controllersToBeRemoved
      The list of controllers to be removed.
      Methods in jgame with parameters of type Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GObject.addController(Controller c)
      Adds the given controller to the controller list.
      void GObject.removeController(Controller c)
      Removes the given controller from the controller list.

    • Uses of Controller in jgame.controller

      Classes in jgame.controller that implement Controller 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractIntensityController
      A controller that controls the intensity of an object on one or more channels.
      class  AbstractLocRotController
      An abstract controller that allows both movement and rotation to follow the path tangent as a moving average.
      class  AlphaTween
      A tween that allows for modifying the alpha of an object.
      class  ConstantMovementController
      A simple controller that continuously moves the target at a constant velocity.
      class  ConstantRotationController
      A simple controller that continuously rotates the target at a constant angular speed.
      class  EntranceExitController
      A controller that changes an object's alpha at a constant rate.
      class  KeyboardLocationController
      A controller that controls an objects location based on keyboard input defined by the given ControlScheme.
      class  MouseLocationController
      A simple controller that causes the object to follow the mouse.
      class  MouseRotationController
      A controller to cause the object to rotate to follow the mouse.
      class  MovementTween
      A tween that allows for movement in two dimensions.
      class  OscillationController
      A controller that allows for rotational oscillation about an object's anchor point, according to a sinusoidal function.
      class  PointOrbitController
      A controller that controls an object's location with polar coordinates with the origin at a specified point or the mouse pointer.
      class  PolygonController
      A controller allowing an object to follow a polygon.
      class  PulsateController
      A controller that causes an object to pulsate according to a sine curve.
      class  RotationTween
      A tween that allows for rotation of an object.
      class  ScaleTween
      A tween that allows for scaling of an object.
      class  SizeTween
      A tween that allows for size in two dimensions.
      class  TweenController
      A controller that allows tweening between two states.
